para_sentences.para_0: Graphs are everywhere. It is important for us to be able to solve graph algorithms so that we know how to approach them when we come across in different forms.
para_sentences.para_1: In question 1, you will implement graph traversal for a sample graph. (MLO1)
para_sentences.para_2: In question 2 and 3, you will apply graph traversal to solve a problem. (MLO2)

para_sentences.para_0: Download the assignment questions from this assignment file.
You will turn in the submission files via Canvas and Gradescope.
para_sentences.para_1: All your answers other than python code files will be turned in through thisCanvas assignment in a pdf file.
para_sentences.para_2: The python files to be submitted on Gradescope:

ol_0: Write BFS and DFS for a graph [4 points]
Apply BFS/DFS to solve a problem [10 points]  Implementation [8 points] Time Complexity [2 point]
Analyse Dijkstra with negative edges [1 points]
(Extra Credit): What would be BFS and DFS traversal on a puzzle [1 point]
